ai-patthana23.7:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.7:1.1_0: Not seeing the skillful qualities you should give up the unskillful and the unskillful state that should be given up by seeing.
ai-patthana23.7:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.7:2.1_0: or unskillful qualities should be given up by development, nor by developing the skillful qualities that give rise to unskillful qualities, be given up by development.
ai-patthana23.7:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.7:3.1_0: He should not give up any desire, because of developing the base consisting of boundlessness, without seeing, and with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.7:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana23.7:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
